item.title: Hello, World! :-)
Hello World!
item.description: Some Math equations? Here you go! Solution of a Quadratic equation of the form: \( ax^{2}+bx +c=0 \) \[ x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a} \] Over to some code Here’s a sample code snippet in C: #include <stdio.h> /* A simple function definition... */ int factorial(int n) { int result = 1; for(int i=1; i<=n; i++) result *= i; return result; } int main() { int n = 5; printf("Hello World!
